system.notes: The Armour created during the Horus Heresy, lighter and smoother, often fitted with a Jump Pack. +10 to Agility.  Readily interchangable with Mk VII Parts .+20 Strength. Subsystems: Autosenses (+15), Osmotic Sustainer, Pain Suppressant (6), Vox Link, Magnetised Boots, Nutrient Recycling (2 Weeks), Recoil Suppression. -10 Manual Dexterity Mod. Roll on Power Armour History 2 Times. 20 minutes to don/doff unaided, 5 mins aided, Half action to remove helmet. Increases Size to Hulking.
